price: Saa nkorͻfoͻ no na wͻ’de tenenee no akͻtͻ yera; na mfasoͻ biara amma wͻn adwadie no so, na wͻ’nnyε ateneneefoͻ.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَٰرَتُهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ish'tarawū al-ḍalālata bil-hudā famā rabiḥat tijāratuhum wamā kānū muh'tadīna
